name: Infinium Browser
body:
sorry there's not much here yet, for more info email _gstack@getinfinium.com_ - or tune in early next year for more details on opensource progress & contributing.

I will make sure to be posting more info here, as the development continues. For now most work is based on the atom-shell (which will be migrated to a version of chromium with integrated atom-shell APIs as soon as it's possible to build and distribute this fork on all platforms.)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
